# frameRate

**Type Property**

A floating-point value for the frame rate of the scene.

## Declaration

```swift
static let frameRate: SCNScene.Attribute
```

## Discussion

This value (in an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object) may be present in scenes loaded from scene files produced using external tools, but has no effect on SceneKit’s rendering of the scene.

## Type Properties

- **endTime**
- **startTime**
- **upAxis**: An `SCNVector3` structure specifying the orientation of the scene.
